narrative.title: Brescia Division - 1942Q3
narrative.situation: Italian Semi-Motorized Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q3.
narrative.objectives: Static defensive infantry division holding fortified positions in El Alamein line from coast to Miteirya Ridge. Deployed in prepared defenses with extensive minefields.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal desert near El Alamein - open sandy terrain with limited rocky outcrops, Qattara Depression 60km to south impassable to vehicles

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Integration with German forces (under command of Panzerarmee Afrika)

environment.terrain_type: Coastal desert near El Alamein - open sandy terrain with limited rocky outcrops, Qattara Depression 60km to south impassable to vehicles
